name: Planet Racing - 3D driving simulator in space
name_original: Planet Racing - 3D driving simulator in space
description:
Planet Racing is a realistic racing simulator where you can feel the atmosphere of driving on different planets with different gravity. Combination of racing and space  extreme driving. Participate in the mode you like and win different rewards! Wonderful 3D graphics and realistic physic developed by using advanced game engines, Planet Racing has stunning 3D effects and best control experience.  Smooth control and addictive gravity. You will not have time to get bored

 Explore a huge open world competing with opponents.  Earn money by winning difficult races and performing stunts. And upgrade your car to win stronger opponents.  

 The Planet Racing might offer a generous assortment of tracks and cars, but the first thing that will strike you to play Planet Racing is just how good it looks. It's no exaggeration to say that Planet Racing  looks freshly-minted, a true modern-looking racer packed full of interesting details.

Planet Racing Features:

- Support for multiple game controllers

- Control with tilt and touch, gamepad or keyboard

- Its easy to play, no need any skills

- Big open world

- Realistic car physic developed by using modern technologies

- Realistic water physic

- A large number of levels 

- Innovative graphics and effects

- A big number of planets whare u can ride: Earth, Mars, Moon, Venus

- Upgrades & Customize

- Made with love

-Realistic vehicle sounds simulation

-Realistic car gearbox simulation

-Free camera movement allows you to view all landscapes

 Test your driving skills in Planet Racing!

All game updates will be uploaded here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MoyoiGames.PlanetRacing
